actions.name: AccessKubernetesApi
actions.description: Grants permission to view Kubernetes objects via AWS EKS console

actions.name: AssociateEncryptionConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to associate encryption configuration to a cluster

actions.name: AssociateIdentityProviderConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an identity provider configuration to a cluster

actions.name: CreateAddon
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS add-on

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS cluster

actions.name: CreateEksAnywhereSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to create an EKS Anywhere subscription

actions.name: CreateFargateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Fargate profile

actions.name: CreateNodegroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS Nodegroup

actions.name: DeleteAddon
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS add-on

actions.name: DeleteCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS cluster

actions.name: DeleteEksAnywhereSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an EKS Anywhere subscription

actions.name: DeleteFargateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Fargate profile

actions.name: DeleteNodegroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS Nodegroup

actions.name: DeregisterCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an External cluster

actions.name: DescribeAddon
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS add-on

actions.name: DescribeAddonConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to list configuration options about an Amazon EKS add-on

actions.name: DescribeAddonVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive version information about the add-ons that Amazon EKS Add-ons supports

actions.name: DescribeCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS cluster

actions.name: DescribeEksAnywhereSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an EKS Anywhere subscription

actions.name: DescribeFargateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an AWS Fargate profile associated with a cluster

actions.name: DescribeIdentityProviderConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Idp config associated with a cluster

actions.name: DescribeNodegroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS nodegroup

actions.name: DescribeUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a given update for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup/add-on (in the specified or default region)

actions.name: DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an asssociated Idp config

actions.name: ListAddons
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS add-ons in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) for a given cluster

actions.name: ListClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS clusters in your AWS account (in the specified or default region)

actions.name: ListEksAnywhereSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to list EKS Anywhere subscriptions

actions.name: ListFargateProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS Fargate profiles in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) associated with a given cluster

actions.name: ListIdentityProviderConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Idp configs in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) associated with a given cluster

actions.name: ListNodegroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS nodegroups in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) attached to given cluster

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for the specified resource

actions.name: ListUpdates
actions.description: Grants permission to list the updates for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup/add-on (in the specified or default region)

actions.name: RegisterCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to register an External cluster

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource

actions.name: UpdateAddon
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon EKS add-on configurations, such as the VPC-CNI version

actions.name: UpdateClusterConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon EKS cluster configurations (eg: API server endpoint access)

actions.name: UpdateClusterVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS cluster

actions.name: UpdateEksAnywhereSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to update an EKS Anywhere subscription

actions.name: UpdateNodegroupConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon EKS nodegroup configurations (eg: min/max/desired capacity or labels)

actions.name: UpdateNodegroupVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS nodegroup
